LanguageData.HoMe.Neverreach: \nWill currently never reach good temperature for consumption.
LanguageData.HoMe.Willreach: \nWill reach ideal temperature for consumption in around {0} hours.
LanguageData.HoMe.Willremain: \nWill remain in ideal range for around {0} hours more.

LanguageData.HoMe.diffusing: Currently diffusing at a rate of {0} per hour.
LanguageData.HoMe.rawStuff: Resources meant to be cooked into something more edible.\nWill never make your colonists happy to eat, but will make them unhappy if they eat it frozen.
LanguageData.HoMe.eatHot: Food meant to be eaten hot
LanguageData.HoMe.eatMiddle: Food best served at room temperature - neither hot nor cold.
LanguageData.HoMe.eatCold: Food meant to be eaten cold
LanguageData.HoMe.drinkHot: A drink that's meant to be served hot
LanguageData.HoMe.drinkCold: A drink best served chilled, but not frozen
